Method Detail

exists

public boolean exists(java.lang.String cityName)
Indicates whether a particular city exists in topology This method returns true when a particular city exists in current topology, false otherwise.

neighbors

public boolean neighbors(java.lang.String city1Name,
                         java.lang.String city2Name)
Indicates whether or not two cities are neighbors This method indicates if two cities are neighbours from inspecting one of the cities neighbor list. If the second city is present in this list, then it means to they are neighbors.

Parameters:
city1Name - The name of the first city
city2Name - The name of the second city
Returns:
\b true if cities are neighbors, \b false otherwise

neighbors

public boolean neighbors(City city1,
                         City city2)
Indicates whether or not two cities are neighbors This method indicates if two cities are neighbours from inspecting one of the cities neighbor list. If the second city is present in this list, then it means to they are neighbors.

Parameters:
city1Name - The name of the first city
city2Name - The name of the second city
Returns:
\b true if cities are neighbors, \b false otherwise

create

public void create(TopologyDescriptor td)
            throws TopologyCreationException
Create the topology from a description This method takes a topology descriptor in input and creates the topology based on this.

Parameters:
td - the topology descriptor
Throws:
TopologyCreationException - when some topological information contains errors

moveOnShortestPath

public City moveOnShortestPath(City from,
                               City to)
Moves on the shortest path between two cities. This method returns the shortest path between two cities. It does so by giving the name of the next city in the path !

shortestDistanceBetween

                                      City to)
Get the shortest distance between cities from source to destination.
